detail_desc: Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details and metal fasteners.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a gently flared skirt.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Tops in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Mesh inner shorts.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Metal chokers in various designs. One decorated with sparkly stones. Adjustable length, 27-35 cm. Supplied in a gift box.

Strapless bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and side support.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Jacket in pattened sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with sewn-on ears. Zip at the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Short parka in a nylon and cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket in an airy, crinkled viscose weave with a deep V-neck and twisted ties at the front. Low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a decorative, crocheted, tasselled trim around the waist. Inset, ladder-stitched trims at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and seam with a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Felted wool beret.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Short skirt in a broderie anglaise cotton weave with a high waist, wrapover front with ties at one side and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a lace trim at the hem.
Fabric belt with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Fitted pencil skirt in a soft, textured knit. High waist with covered elastication.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit with padded, triangular cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways at the back.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Lace-trimmed jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck front and back, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Block-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 60x180 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Shorts in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and raw, roll-edge hems.
Boxy polo shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, press-studs at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Imitation suede clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Size approx. 4x14x20 cm.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.

Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in crinkled, stretch jersey. Elasticated V-neck front and back with a wide flounce trim in a cotton weave that continues over the shoulders. Ties at the back and gathers at the sides for a draped effect.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft modal jersey.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket. Long legs with a tab and button.

Long kimono in a patterned weave with decorative lace embroidery, dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves. Front pockets, narrow ties on the inside and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut, slightly shorter blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.

Glittery trainers with a print motif, embroidery and appliqués. Transparent soles with flashing LED lights in different colours that activate when you move. Adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Semi-shiny tights with a push-up effect on the bum and a firm sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 70 denier.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.
Briefs in lace and mesh with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered velour with spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
V-neck peplum top in jersey crêpe with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups, side support, a concealed zip at the side and a seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined at the top.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined drawstring hood with a detachable faux fur trim, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck body in velour decorated with metal studs. Long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in a soft Tencel® lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the top with buttons, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. High slits with ties at the sides for easier nursing access. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.

Small shoulder bag in imitation suede with fringing and heart-shaped studs on the front. Narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end, and a zip with a round tab and tassel at the top. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing with short slits at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Knee-length circular skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Shirt jacket in a soft weave containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester and wool content of the shirt jacket is recycled.
